Mobile phones have evolved significantly beyond their initial role as mere communication devices. Originally large and cumbersome, they have transformed into sleek, multifunctional gadgets. Early mobile phones could only make calls, but with the introduction of smartphones, users now enjoy a wide array of features at their disposal.
